SEARCH

Class PhysicalNode

java.lang.Object
PhysicalNode
public class PhysicalNode extends Object
Physical Node, connecting to its peers with RabbitMQ, sending messages to its neighbors. This has the objective of being a representation of a physical node on a single process.

  • Constructor Details

    • PhysicalNode

      public PhysicalNode(int value, ArrayList<Integer> connectedTo, int numberOfElements, NodeRunner caller)
      Constructor of the PhysicalNode
      Parameters:
      value - the value of the node
      connectedTo - the neighbors of the node, as an ArrayList of Integers
      numberOfElements - the total number of nodes
      caller - the class who called this PhysicalNode (a NodeRunner)

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Message msg) throws IOException
      Send a message to another node
      Parameters:
      msg - Message containing the destinator and the message
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of issues with basicPublish

    • addDirection

      public void addDirection(int to, int next)
      Add a direction to 'to', passing by 'next'.
      Parameters:
      to - the target
      next - the node to go to as a next step
